title: BRIEF-Mellanox Technologies Q2 GAAP Shr $0.71
text:
April 17, 2018 / 11:54 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Mellanox Technologies Q2 GAAP Shr $0.71 Reuters Staff 
April 17 (Reuters) - Mellanox Technologies Ltd: 
* MELLANOX ACHIEVES RECORD QUARTERLY REVENUES; UPDATES 2018 OUTLOOK 
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.98 * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.71 
* Q1 REVENUE $251 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $244.9 MILLION 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.83 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q2 REVENUE $255 MILLION TO $265 MILLION 
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $1.02 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS OF 68.0 PERCENT TO 69.0 PERCENT 
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 NON-GAAP OPERATING MARGIN OF 21.0 PERCENT TO 22.0 PERCENT 
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $249.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
